name: Jos√© Mujica
description: Uruguayan politician and former president, known as 'the world's poorest president' for his humble lifestyle and progressive policies
philosophy: The worst enemy of human life is not misery, but rather too much prosperity. True wealth lies in simple pleasures and solidarity.
quotes: I'm not the poorest president. The poorest is the one who needs a lot to live
We can live only 100 years, if that! So why do we want more than we can use?
Either we're happy with little, free of the weight of things, or we have nothing
